name: Dance with Chimmy! FNAF x BT21 game
name_original: Dance with Chimmy! FNAF x BT21 game
description:
Hi guys! I really really like BTS and their BT21 series so I decided to play around with a mashup of FNAF and BT21! You'll see what I mean when I say mashup  Anyways, this is a short game, enjoy! Warning: Jumpscare! 

Gameplay: Click to dance and sing with Chimmy!
